mapper.select: SELECT M.PROJECT_NO "PROJECT", M.SPEC_NO "SPEC", D.CATE_NO || D.OPTION_NO "STANDARD OPTION", GET_PRODUCT_BY_PROJECT(M.PROJECT_NO) "PRODUCT" FROM HBOM.PSPEC_MASTER M, HBOM.PSPEC_DETAIL D WHERE M.SPEC_NO = D.SPEC_NO AND M.PROJECT_NO = D.PROJECT_NO AND M.GMODEL = D.GMODEL AND D.ITNO IS NOT NULL AND M.USE_CD = 'E' --수출 ###### AND M.STATUS = 'CURR' --운영스펙 ###### AND M.PROJECT_NO IN (SELECT DISTINCT PROJECT_CODE FROM WIRING_CATEGORY_NO) -- 지정 프로젝트 리스트 ##### AND TO_CHAR(M.LAST_MODIFY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-1, 'YYYY-MM-DD') -- 어제 날짜에 해당하는 데이터 ################ ORDER BY 1, 2, 3

WITH WIRINGBOM AS ( SELECT DISTINCT CI.PITEM_ID CHILE_ID, CIRW.POBJECT_NAME CHILD_NAME, OCC.PUID OCCUID FROM INFODBA.PITEM PI , INFODBA.PITEMREVISION PIR , INFODBA.PSTRUCTURE_REVISIONS PSR , INFODBA.PPSOCCURRENCE OCC , INFODBA.PITEM CI , INFODBA.PITEMREVISION CIR , INFODBA.PWORKSPACEOBJECT CIRW WHERE OCC.RCHILD_ITEMU = CI.PUID AND OCC.RPARENT_BVRU = PSR.PVALU_0 AND PSR.PUID = PIR.PUID AND PIR.RITEMS_TAGU = PI.PUID AND CIR.PUID = CIRW.PUID AND CIRW.POBJECT_TYPE = 'S7_VehpartRevision' AND CIRW.POBJECT_NAME IN ('WIRING ASSY-MAIN','WIRING ASSY-ENGINE','WIRING ASSY-FLOOR','WIRING ASSY-FLOOR-LH','WIRING ASSY-FLOOR-RH') AND CIR.PUID = GETLATESTRELEASEDREVISION(CI.PUID) AND PIR.PUID = GETLATESTRELEASEDREVISION(PI.PUID) START WITH PI.PITEM_ID = #{PRODUCT_NO, jdbcType=VARCHAR} CONNECT BY NOCYCLE PRIOR CIR.PUID = PIR.PUID AND ((CIRW.POBJECT_TYPE = 'S7_FunctionRevision' AND SUBSTR(CI.PITEM_ID, 0, 4) IN ('F80A', 'F80B', 'F80C')) OR CIRW.POBJECT_TYPE != 'S7_FunctionRevision') ) SELECT CHILE_ID, CHILD_NAME, (SELECT DATA FROM INFODBA.IMAN_MVLBLOB WHERE NAME = OCCUID) "PART OPTION" FROM WIRINGBOM ORDER BY 1,2
SELECT RTRIM(XMLAGG(XMLELEMENT("USER_ID", USER_ID, ',') ORDER BY USER_ID).EXTRACT('//text()').GETSTRINGVAL(), ',') MAIL_LIST FROM WIRING_MAIL_LIST
